content.question: The system of labor that is the focus of the excerpt would eventually change most dramatically as a result of the

choices.label: success of the woman suffrage movement
rapid increase in immigration from southern and eastern Europe
growing access to automobiles and public transportation
demands of industrial production during the Second World War

content.answer: demands of industrial production during the Second World War

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
